name: Baseball, But Fun
description:
Baseball is no longer the worst way to spend hours of your life. Never again will you see someone, slumped in the back of a hard plastic chair, popcorn falling off of their stomach. No, they'll be on the edge of their seat. Why? Because in this world, Baseball is the highest octane, death-defying fighting competition ever conceived. A never-ending fight to the death on a shifting playing field. Will you survive?

Baseball but Fun is an isometric, semi-bullet hell set on a changing field. Fight waves of enemies with your trusty bat, cracking skulls and reflecting pitches back to their sender ( It also may be a little cuter than advertised ). The demo contains an endless mode, and will be receiving periodic updates with more content, including bat customization, upgrades, more enemies + stages, new music, and boss fights!

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • MOUSE - Aim
  • LMB - Swing
  • RMB/Space - Jump
  • TAB/R - Restart
  • ESC - Quit

Currently only operates on Windows, Mac build coming soon!

Enjoy the game? Leave a comment below and rating! If you find any bugs or have any critiques, DM them to @JMRSNH on twitter!
